languages.text: {n}Взгляды самых ретивых бойцов Комиссара недовольно вспыхивают, но большинство слишком раздавлено свалившимися на них новостями. Они покорно опускаются на колени и склоняют головы, как и положено серфам перед госпо{mf|дином|жой}.{/n}

{n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority's spirits are only further crushed by this news. They drop to their knees and bow their heads, as is expected of serfs in the presence of their {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляды самых ретивых бойцов Комиссара недовольно вспыхивают, но большинство слишком раздавлено свалившимися на них новостями. Они покорно опускаются на колени и склоняют головы, как и положено серфам перед госпо{mf|дином|жой}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority's spirits are crushed by the news. They get down on their knees and bow their heads as is expected of serfs in the presence of their {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

traits.locale_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority's spirits are crushed by the news. They get down on their knees and bow their heads as is expected of serfs in the presence of their {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

traits.locale_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority's spirits are only further crushed by this news. They drop to their knees and bow their heads, as is expected of serfs in the presence of their {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

traits.locale_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority's spirits are only further crushed by this news. They drop to their knees and bow their heads, as is expected of serfs in the presence of their {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}コミッサーの最も熱狂的なファイターたちは不愉快そうな視線を向けていたが、大多数の闘士たちはこの知らせによって、さらに意気消沈していた。彼らは主人の前で農奴がそうするように、崩れ落ち、頭をもたげた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority's spirits are only further crushed by this news. They drop to their knees and bow their heads, as is expected of serfs in the presence of their {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーの最も熱狂的なファイターたちは不愉快そうな視線を向けていたが、大多数の闘士たちはこの知らせによって、さらに意気消沈していた。彼らは主人の前で農奴がそうするように、崩れ落ち、頭をもたげた。{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}你从政委最狂热的那些战士的脸上看到了不满的表情，但绝大多数战士的精神都被这个消息压垮了。他们跪在地上，向你低下了头，就像农奴面对他们的{mf|主人|女主人}时那样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority's spirits are only further crushed by this news. They drop to their knees and bow their heads, as is expected of serfs in the presence of their {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你从政委最狂热的那些战士的脸上看到了不满的表情，但绝大多数战士的精神都被这个消息压垮了。他们跪在地上，向你低下了头，就像农奴面对他们的{mf|主人|女主人}时那样。{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Percibes miradas de desagrado procedentes de los combatientes más fervientes del comisario, pero los ánimos de la mayoría solo se abaten más al recibir la noticia. Se arrodillan e inclinan la cabeza como se espera de los siervos en presencia de su {mf|maestro|maestra}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority's spirits are only further crushed by this news. They drop to their knees and bow their heads, as is expected of serfs in the presence of their {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Percibes miradas de desagrado procedentes de los combatientes más fervientes del comisario, pero los ánimos de la mayoría están abatidos por la noticia. Se arrodillan e inclinan la cabeza como se espera de los siervos en presencia de su {mf|maestro|maestra}.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Die wildesten Kämpfer des Kommissars blicken dich missbilligend an, doch der Großteil der Menge ist ob dieser Nachricht nur noch niedergeschlagener. Sie fallen auf die Knie und neigen die Köpfe, wie es von Sklaven in Anwesenheit {mf|ihres Herren|ihrer Herrin} erwartet wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority's spirits are only further crushed by this news. They drop to their knees and bow their heads, as is expected of serfs in the presence of their {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die wildesten Kämpfer des Kommissars blicken dich missbilligend an, doch der Großteil der Menge ist am Boden zerstört ob dieser Nachricht. Sie fallen auf die Knie und neigen die Köpfe, wie es von Sklaven in Anwesenheit {mf|ihres Herren|ihrer Herrin} erwartet wird.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Ceux des combattants qui étaient les plus fidèles au commissaire échangent des regards mécontents, mais la majorité est tout simplement anéantie par la nouvelle. Ils tombent à genoux et inclinent la tête, comme attendu de la part de serfs en présence de leur {mf|maître|maîtresse}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority's spirits are only further crushed by this news. They drop to their knees and bow their heads, as is expected of serfs in the presence of their {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ceux des combattants qui étaient les plus fidèles au commissaire échangent des regards mécontents, mais la majorité est tout simplement anéantie par la nouvelle. Les gladiateurs se contentent néanmoins de s'agenouiller et d'incliner la tête, comme attendu de la part de serfs en présence de leur {mf|maître|maîtresse}.{mf|
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Komiser'in en hararetli savaşçılarından hoşnutsuz bakışlar alsan da çoğunluk, bu haberi alınca daha da umutsuzluğa kapılıyor.{mf|Beylerinin|Hanımlarının} huzuruna çıkan kullardan beklendiği üzere diz çöküp başlarını öne eğiyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority's spirits are only further crushed by this news. They drop to their knees and bow their heads, as is expected of serfs in the presence of their {mf|master|mistress}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser'in en hararetli savaşçılarından hoşnutsuz bakışlar alsan da, çoğunluk bu haberi alınca daha da umutsuzluğa kapılıyor.{mf|Beylerinin|Hanımlarının} huzuruna çıkan kullardan beklendiği üzere diz çöküp başlarını öne eğiyorlar.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison
